h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 7
content: Additionally, just onwards from this fight, as you progress on the main story path, you will come across the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince at the Sandgate Village \- Valley of Despair Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. This is a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 7'.
The content is as follows:
Additionally, just onwards from this fight, as you progress on the main story path, you will come across the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince at the Sandgate Village \- Valley of Despair Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. This is a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them.
